presentationTable.name: Orders Dates
presentationTable.description:
->
This folder contains additional Orders Dates attributes like Order Date, Billed Date and so on.

presentationColumns.name: Order Date
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Oder Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This field is of type Date.

presentationColumns.name: Order Month
presentationColumns.description: Extracts the month out of the the Oder Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.

presentationColumns.name: Billed Date
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Oder Bill Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This field is of type Date.

presentationColumns.name: Billed Month
presentationColumns.description: Extracts the month out of the the Oder Bill Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.

presentationColumns.name: Billed Year
presentationColumns.description: Extracts the year out of the the Oder Bill Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.
